relevant_findings.HEENT: AT/NC, EOMI, PERRL, anicteric sclera, pink conjunctiva, MMM, good dentition
relevant_findings.neck: nontender supple neck, no LAD, no JVD
relevant_findings.cardiac: RRR, S1/S2, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs
relevant_findings.lung: CTAB, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi, breathing comfortably without use of accessory muscles
relevant_findings.abdomen: nondistended, +BS, mild tenderness in lower abdomen, no rebound/guarding, no hepatosplenomegaly
relevant_findings.extremities: no cyanosis, clubbing or edema, moving all 4 extremities with purpose
relevant_findings.skin: warm and well perfused, no excoriations or lesions, no rashes

changes_over_time.abdominal_pain: Patient reports improvement in abdominal pain after initial presentation.
